entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
